tweet: I'm glad the House passed @RepRoKhanna's 21st Century IDEA (H.R. 5759) to modernize the federal government, so we can serve the American people more efficiently and effectively. https://khanna.house.gov/media/press-releases/release-rep-khanna-passage-21st-century-integrated-digital-experience-act-idea …

President Trump’s signing of #CISA will allow @DHSgov to more effectively protect Americans from growing cyber threats. Looking forward to the advances that will be made in support of our critical cybersecurity and infrastructure security missions under @CISAKrebs' leadership.

The U.S. will no longer turn a blind eye toward the UN’s blatant bias against Israel. I appreciate @nikkihaley’s strong leadership in support of our allies. https://twitter.com/USUN/status/1063197862299881472 …
Looking forward to today's joint hearing on @DHSgov and @DeptofDefense's cooperative cybersecurity efforts. Tune in at 3 p.m. ET.  https://youtu.be/BhwjiTpnSYo  @HASCRepublicans @HouseHomeland

I applaud the final passage of H.R. 3359 to redesignate and reorganize @NPPD as the Cybersecurity and Infrastructure Security Agency. I look forward to the great work that will be accomplished through a more clearly defined structure at our nation’s lead cybersecurity agency.
